name: Lightguard
description:
Lightguard

Controls
Move: W/A/S/D
Action: E
Throw Item: Hold left click

Story
It’s 7:45PM. The protagonist, called A Nightguard Named Hank, who is a security guard in a police office, finds himself short before starting his nightshift. All dressed up and equipped with a flashlight he starts his first round. The guard’s main goal is to survive the night shift up till 06:00AM, surviving and defending hordes of burglars, farmers and other unsatisfied civilians. He will do this by using and combining items that can be found in the ‘Lost & found’ cabinet/box.

This game was made in 48 hours for the Global Game Jam 2021.

https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/lightguard-8
